title: 3 and Out - Troy Aikman ---> MNF, Rodgers Decision Time, Speak Up Russ, Deshaun Watson Buyers, Silly USC NIL $$$
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Troy Aikman ---> MNF, Rodgers Decision Time, Speak Up Russ, Deshaun Watson Buyers, Silly USC NIL $$$
description:
John discusses why MNF signing Troy Aikman is such a massive get, how the threat of leaving for broadcasting gives Sean McVay leverage in his contract re-negotiation, if the Packers should read anything into Aaron Rodgers recent IG drama as far as his pending free agency decision, if Russ Wilson will ever break from character and publicly demand a trade, if teams will deal for Deshaun Watson despite pending civil cases, and why Caleb Williams huge endorsement deals show USC's giant advantage in the NIL era.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
